Subject: Re: SOL3AMTES - Request for review 3PL terms in UK
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Rijal, Sean,

Please find attached the Distribution Agreement between MCTC LLC and Threads Styling Ltd, as well as the amended Terms and Conditions between Threads Styling Ltd and 3PL.

For the distribution agreement, note that we have used the draft negotiated with a third party UK based distributor, which should therefore represent a balanced agreement between both companies. There are commercial items in this document that need to be confirmed / added to the draft from your side, as agreed between yourself and Threads. 

For the Terms and Conditions of 3PL, there are comments for your confirmation. Additionally, would appreciate if you can confirm the amendments to the commercial clauses generally, specifically those regarding insurance.

For the Terms and Conditions of 3PL, there are comments for your confirmation. Additionally, would appreciate if you can confirm the amendments to the commercial clauses generally, specifically those regarding insurance.

Note that both of these documents will need to be reviewed and confirmed by the Threads team (and for 3PL, the amends need to be confirmed prior to sending to 3PL).

Let us know if you need any further clarification.

Best,
Faraz

Date: Tuesday, 11 March 2025 at 10:30 AM
To: Faraz Hasan <Faraz.hasan@chalhoub.com>, Zain Manna <Zain.Manna@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Sean Anderson <Sean.Anderson@chalhoub.com>, George Kurian <George.Kurian@chalhoub.com>
Subject: SOL3AMTES - Request for review 3PL terms in UK

Dear @Faraz Hasan <mailto:Faraz.hasan@chalhoub.com> , 

I hope you are well.

SOL3MATES is partnering with a 3PL partner in the UK for our upcoming launch in April.

They have a shared their terms for us proceed including commercial agreement.

 

Here: https://na4.docusign.net/Signing/?ti=8d121744cfbf439188afac15192c09c3 <https://na4.docusign.net/Signing/?ti=8d121744cfbf439188afac15192c09c3> 

It is just a 5 pager with short clauses. Just to keep in mind that we need to finalize this max next week as we’re expecting to receive stock for April soon with them.

Can you kindly review and sign if there’s no further comments.

 

Best regards,

Rijal

Dear @Faraz Hasan <mailto:Faraz.hasan@chalhoub.com> , 

I hope you are well.

SOL3MATES is partnering with a 3PL partner in the UK for our upcoming launch in April.

They have a shared their terms for us proceed including commercial agreement.

 

Here: https://na4.docusign.net/Signing/?ti=8d121744cfbf439188afac15192c09c3 <https://na4.docusign.net/Signing/?ti=8d121744cfbf439188afac15192c09c3> 

It is just a 5 pager with short clauses. Just to keep in mind that we need to finalize this max next week as we’re expecting to receive stock for April soon with them.

Can you kindly review and sign if there’s no further comments.

 

Best regards,

Rijal
